features: THE CHARLESTON COLLECTION: Drawing inspiration from Southern living, this cookware melds timeless elegance with modern functionality. Not only does it suit both contemporary and traditional kitchens with its universal charm, but it also offers exceptional nonstick performance and unparalleled functionality.
8 INCH FRY PAN: A nonstick coating with even heat distribution is ideal for cooking eggs, searing salmon, stir frying veggies, and more!

ULTRA NONSTICK SURFACE: Easy on, easy off with an interior that prevents food from sticking. Little to no oil or butter is needed to cook, plus it’s made without PFOA, PFOS, lead, or cadmium so it’s healthier for you and your family.

10X LONGER LASTING: 3 heavy-duty layers crafted with forged aluminum construction feature a remarkably durable coating that’s scratch-resistant and metal-utensil safe. Built to last 10x longer than conventional coatings and made to stand up to all your cooking tasks.

EFFORTLESS CLEANING: Food won’t stick to the surface when properly used on low and medium heat. No need for scrubbing. Just wipe the nonstick surface with a paper towel and you’re set for the next time!
DISHWASHER SAFE: Save more time after cooking, especially during busy weeknights. Once you’re done, just place your cookware into the dishwasher and let it do all the cleaning.
OVEN SAFE UP TO 500˚F: Finish your cooking in the oven. Fry pan is compatible with induction, gas, halogen, ceramic, and electric stovetops.

DEEPER THAN AVERAGE: Crafted to be deeper than traditional fry pans, these are designed to hold more ingredients. Whether you’re cooking for a large family or looking to have leftovers, this pan is a must-have.

EASY TO HANDLE: Easy to lift and move around, from stovetop to oven to table, yet sturdy enough to handle all your cooking needs. Gold ergonomic handles stay cool to the touch to offer maximum comfort while cooking.
10-YEAR GUARANTEE: Gotham Steel cookware is built to provide years of quality usage and is backed by a 10-year limited guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very effective and attractive addition to my kitchen
reviews.reviewText: First out of the box, I was just wowed by how beautiful this pan is. Had to make a special place for it in my display of pots and pans. But better than that, the first time I used it, I was so impressed with the evenness of the heat and how quickly it heated up. I never made browned butter that quickly before. A great start to clams and linguine. Looking forward to using it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best pan I have ever had! Nothing sticks. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic versatile pan
reviews.reviewText: I love this sauté pan so much! I needed a pan I could use on my glass top stove but also move into the oven at high temps in a similar way to cast iron. I probably use this more as a braising pan/dutch oven than a sauté pan and it does a perfect job. Also love the strainer built in to the lid. It’s also very pretty, but more importantly it cleans sooooo easily it’s crazy. I did a lovely French style pot roast with veg that cooked for hours and it was clean in a few minutes with no scrubbing at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skeptical No More
reviews.reviewText: Truth be told, I've tried non-stick pans before that didn't work out. I have seen these pans advertised on TV and was a bit skeptical but decided to give them a try. To my delight, they truly are non-stick, great for cooking without added fat and super easy to clean. Really pleased with my purchase! Thank you for a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the pan. But the price dropped $10.00 a few days after I purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received this scratched but needed it for tonight so I didn't have time to return and replace. You can tell his product will scratch very easily. If I knew this I would not have paid $50 for it. Not pleased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This pan will take a beating and keep asking for more
reviews.reviewText: I love granitestone. This stuff is a work horse in the kitchen. You can dog it to death, it will look you in the eye and ask for more.I will be the first to admit I am hard on my stuff. You need to be tough to hang here. So my stuff has to be able to handle the abuse that is sure to follow. The granite stone is able to do that.This is a non-stick pan that truly is non-stick. I have done scrambled eggs in it with no butter or grease. They come out with little to no residue. Its one of those quick wipe out and call it done cleans even.I baked some biscuits in this pan, turned them out onto the counter to see how they were heating. As far as I could see, its a nice even heating with this pan. My crowd didn't have a problem eating them.I thought the pan was a bit weighty. Not bad, I was still able to spin it by its handle with no problem. This is really a good pan. I can see ordering a set in the very near future. Recommend.
